Welcome to DataQA's documentation!
##################################

Documentation of the DataQA package which contains functionality to perform
quality assessment of APERTIF data processed by Apercal

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   crosscal
   continuum
   line
   selfcal
   report
   pipeline
